definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Send a phone card or care package to a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 给士兵们寄电话卡或是爱心包裹。

sentences.english: Calling cards are cards with numbers on them.
sentences.chinese: 电话卡是一些带有号码的卡。

sentences.english: Using the inexpensive phone card, a villager can call anyone in the country.
sentences.chinese: 村民能使用这种价廉电话卡给国内任何人打电话。

sentences.english: I'd like to buy an IP Card for national and international calls.
sentences.chinese: 我想买张可以打国内和国际长途的电话卡。

sentences.english: There must be a kiosk selling phone cards around here somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 附近一定有一间卖电话卡的售货亭。

sentences.english: and you top up your phone and you know, whatever it is.
sentences.chinese: 给电话卡充值，无论什么事。

sentences.english: The first Japanese card has a value fo about 28000 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 日本的第一张电话卡价值大约28000英镑。

sentences.english: Two stage dialling, for calling cards.
Normal SIM card can not make international calls.
sentences.chinese: 普通的电话卡不能打国际长话。

sentences.english: I used to listen to rock music but now I collect telephone cards and paintings.
sentences.chinese: 我过去常听摇滚乐，可现在我集电话卡和画。

sentences.english: Could you please show me how to use this phone card?
sentences.chinese: 请问您能告诉我怎么使用这个电话卡吗？

sentences.english: I need to buy a calling card .
Yeah, I could make pictures with my phone cards by putting them together.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我可在我的电话卡上画图把它们放在一起。

sentences.english: Eine Telefonkarte zu 20 Euro oder zu 30 Euro?
sentences.chinese: 您要20欧元还是30欧元的电话卡？

sentences.english: The revenues were derived from online product sales of prepaid game and telephone cards.
sentences.chinese: 收入都是来自在线预付费游戏卡及电话卡的销售资金。

definition: to make a long distance call
to report the loss of something
to replace a lost or damaged SIM card, retaining one's original telephone number/SIM replacement
public transportation card/prepaid transit card/subway pass
Personal Handy-phone System (PHS), mobile network system operating in China 1998-2013, branded "Little Smart"
